attributes.action: Stop cycle highway plan for Chiswick high road
attributes.background: The plan in place for a cycle lane on Chiswick high road will reduce the number of lanes for Cars and buses to 1. This will  cause congestion and problems/delays during rush hour times

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
